name: O.U.T.SIDER
description:
O.U.T.SIDER was made during a week long game jam at my School, Bellecour Ecole, with two other wonderful students. It is based on an understanding of Sound of Silence's lyrics in which the sound of silence would be our thoughts. These thoughts are flattened by mass media and its neon screens.

In the game, you are one of the few left with critical thinking, which allows you to parry the O.U.T. (One Unique Thought) rays lit screens are firing at you.

Beware the O.U.T. rays or you might give in to their colorless way of thinking.

Hopefully, you might touch the heart of people on your way, bringing them back, and even recovering from your wounds.

Controls are explained within the game.

You can fin me on twitter @I208iN.

My two wonderful teammates:

Claire VELLAS @ClaireDeChat on Twitter

Maxime LEJARS (maximelejars.wixsite.com/maximelejars)
